name: HPF_TRTMNT_TEAM
description: The HPF_TRTMT_TEAM table contains information on treatment teams. Each record in this table is based on PAT_ENC_CSN_ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BILLING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the billing provider record.

columns.name: SERV_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment team provider record.

columns.name: TRTMT_TM_BEGIN_DT
columns.description: The date and time a treatment team assignment began.

columns.name: TRTMT_TM_END_DT
columns.description: The date and time a treatment team assignment ended.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.
